activities: Organizations (schools, training centers, corporations) enroll users (students and course subscribers) into online training courses.  The user’s name and email address is captured in the system in their user profile for the purpose of faculty or facilitator communication with and between users/participants in the online course.  This information is not used for any other commercial purpose whatsoever.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For questions or concerns regarding privacy statements and Moodlerooms, Inc., the first point of contact is to write to privacy@moodlerooms.com. For any unresolved complaints or if a complaint is not satisfactorily addressed, the organization will work in cooperation with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
